description: dark indigo border with marbleized green, gold and burgundy textured interior; gold rectangle in ULC; gold square in LRC; linear curing shape that begins in ULQ, moving downward to center right, finishing in LLQ; series of vertical burgundy lines along top edge; textured cluster of pigments in center right in burgundy, gold and pale blue
inscription: LLC, in pencil: one day at my old home | LLC, in pencil: 故郷の一日 {Furusato no tsuitachi} | bottom center, in pencil: 50~10
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: One Day at My Old Home
